title: "Spearmen" Active (~70+)
comment_one:
AGI as last thing to max
*1 = As much as needed.
Use extra points as you see fit. Crit, luck, wisdom/mana if you have mana issues
comment_two:
Veins of inferal is very strong as you get higher smithing, Just watch your damage per point if you go past ~50 or so and compare to high poly limbs
*1= extra points can go to AGI if you need damage to 1 shot, or drop rarity of not.
comment_three: Max "SpeeDna", "Extendo Rangeo" and "Homing Arrows", excess points can go towards maxing "Magic Shortbow" or "Woah, that was fast!"
notes: This build uses a spear and extendo rangeo to hit a large number of enemies with melee. This build is great for clearing coliseum as an archer, gives excelent active xp gains, and does fair vs bosses.
